extension.dc:title: Literature References
extension.name: Reference
extension.dc:description: Bibliography, i.e. list of literature references. For example a taxon or occurrence/specimen.

property.name: identifier
property.dc:description: DOI, ISBN, URI, etc refering to the reference. This can be repeated in multiple rows to include multiple identifiers, e.g. a DOI and a URL pointing to a pdf of the article.

property.name: bibliographicCitation
property.dc:description: A text string referring to an un-parsed bibliographic citation.
property.examples: Hartge, P., Genetics of reproductive lifespan. Nature Genetics 41, 637 - 638 (2009)

property.name: title
property.examples: "Genetics of reproductive lifespan", "Field Guide to Moths of Eastern North America"

property.name: creator
property.dc:description: The author or authors of the referenced work

property.name: date
property.dc:description: Date of publication, recommended ISO format YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD

property.name: source
property.dc:description: If the reference is part of a larger work, this can be cited here. In case of articles this is the journal, for parts of books the book itself

property.name: description
property.examples: "Five genome-wide association studies of the timing of menarche and menopause have now taken us beyond the range of candidate gene and linkage studies. The list of new genetic associations identified for these two traits should shed light on the mechanisms of ovarian aging, as well as breast cancer and other diseases associated with reproductive lifespan."

property.name: subject
property.dc:description: Semicolon seperated list of keywords. Can include a resource qualifier that specifies the relation of this reference to the taxon, e.g namePublishedIn

property.name: language
property.dc:description: ISO 639-1 language code indicating the source language of the referent publication

property.name: rights
property.dc:description: copyright information relating to the referenced publication
property.examples: Copyright Â© 2009 Wiley-Liss, Inc., A Wiley Company

property.name: taxonRemarks
property.dc:description: Annotation of taxon-specific information related to the referenced publication.
property.examples: "transferred H. nigritarsus to Acanolonia"; "Type specimen is a skeleton"

property.name: type
property.dc:description: Used to assign a bibliographic reference to list of taxonomic or nomenclatural categories. Best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.
property.examples: Original publication of new combination (comb nov.)

property.name: datasetID
property.dc:description: An identifier for a subset of data.
